data.actual_result: Some parts of the box edges are gone
data.expected_result: They keep all parts of the edges
data.short_description: On the Nitro page, some of the perk boxes have their lines partly missing around them [Website Bug] [Firefox] [13" Specific (1440x900)]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Nitro page at /nitro - Set your zoom to 90% - Scroll down where the perk boxes are - Observe the box edges
